rooms.description: Spacious living room with integrated dining area and open plan design for natural light. Designed following Vastu principles by facing south-east to encourage positive energy.
Efficient kitchenette adjacent to the living room with a focus on energy efficiency and modern appliances. Designed with Vastu in mind, positioned in the northeast to harness prosperity.
Small utility room for storage of cleaning supplies and maintenance equipment. Placed strategically near kitchen area.
Main ground floor bathroom, designed with water conservation features; placed in the north-west area as per Vastu for health benefits.

openings.description: Main entrance aligned with auspicious directions, ensuring smooth flow of positive energy.
Large windows installed to maximize natural light and ventilation, placed according to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a dedicated balcony offering a scenic view. Following Vastu principles, the bed is placed in the south-west corner.
Cozy guest bedroom with a built-in balcony for relaxation and fresh air. The room layout follows Vastu to enhance comfort.
Master bedroom featuring a private balcony, en-suite bathroom, and storage area. Positioned with the head of the bed in the south-west as per Vastu.
Multi-purpose home theater space that doubles as a lounge, equipped with acoustic treatment and energy-efficient lighting. Placed in the eastern section for creativity.

openings.description: Balconies provided to each bedroom to ensure ample ventilation and natural light.
Windows designed for optimal lighting while adhering to Vastu principles.

additional_notes: Design incorporates cost-effective building materials and modular components to adhere to the tight budget constraint.
The split-level design promotes privacy between living areas and bedrooms, ensuring a peaceful environment suitable for a bachelor pad.
Vastu elements have been incorporated throughout to maximize positive energy flow and occupant well-being.
